description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter application. It defines the app's main widget, a home page with a progress indicator, and sets up basic theming.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that initializes the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays the app's main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage that builds the Scaffold with AppBar and body containing a loading message and progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the application, calls runApp with MyApp instance.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
